name: Strikingly
long_description:
Strikingly lets you build a gorgeous, mobile optimized website in minutes. For your business, organization, or personal branding, a good-looking site is necessary for your online legitimacy in the Mobile Age.

With no code or design at all, you can set up a professional website in under 30 minutes, and it'll look great on your phone, tablet, and computer. Check it out at http://www.strikingly.com/. We're hiring! Please see: http://www.strikingly.com/s/careers .

Our mission is to give everyone the power to turn their creative ideas into reality and build brands around them. See why: http://www.strikingly.com/s/manifesto
one_liner: The easiest way to create a beautiful, mobile optimized website.
